data.fullContent: The universe is so vast that scientists have not been able to find an end to it. To help us better understand the universe, scientists have divided it into segments. The divisions are based on things such as size and distance. Because the universe is so large, each division is divided again and again to include smaller units. For example, a star is a small, light dot in the night sky. It is one of the many objects that surround the Earth. It is smaller than the planets the Earth orbits around, which are smaller than the sun that the Earth circles in the solar system, which is smaller than the galaxy that the solar system circles in the Milky Way. The Milky Way is an average-sized galaxy in a cluster of billions of galaxies that are part of the universe.

q1.translation: 宇宙如此之大，科学家们至今还无法找到它的尽头。为了帮助我们更好地了解宇宙，科学家们把它分成了几个部分。划分是基于大小和距离等因素。因为宇宙是如此之大，每一划分都被一次又一次地划分以包含更小的单位。例如，星星是夜空中的一个小光点。
q1.front: The universe is so vast that scientists have not been able to find an end to it. To help us better understand the universe, scientists have divided it into segments. The divisions are based on things such as size and distance. Because the universe is so large, each division is divided again and again to include smaller units. For example, a star is a small, light dot in the night sky.
q1.content: The universe is so vast that scientists have not ____ able to find an end to it. To ____ us better understand the universe, scientists have divided ____ into segments. The divisions are ____ on things such ____ size and distance. Because the universe ____ so large, each division is divided ____ and again to include smaller units. For example, a ____ is a small, light dot in the ____ sky.

q2.translation: 宇宙如此之大，科学家们至今还无法找到它的尽头。为了帮助我们更好地了解宇宙，科学家们把它分成了几个部分。划分是基于大小和距离等因素。因为宇宙是如此之大，每一划分都被一次又一次地划分以包含更小的单位。例如，星星是夜空中的一个小光点。它是环绕地球的众多物体之一。它比地球围绕的行星要小，地球围绕的行星比太阳系里的太阳要小，太阳系围绕的星系又比银河系里的星系要小。银河系是由数十亿个星系组成的星系团中的一个中等大小的星系，它们是宇宙的一部分。
q2.front: The universe is so vast that scientists have not been able to find an end to it. To help us better understand the universe, scientists have divided it into segments. The divisions are based on things such as size and distance. Because the universe is so large, each division is divided again and again to include smaller units. For example, a star is a small, light dot in the night sky.

q2.ending: It is smaller than the planets the Earth orbits around, which are smaller than the sun that the Earth circles in the solar system, which is smaller than the galaxy that the solar system circles in the Milky Way. The Milky Way is an average-sized galaxy in a cluster of billions of galaxies that are part of the universe.

options.sentence: The universe is so big that scientists have divided it into segments to help us better understand it.
The universe is incredibly large, with an estimated size of more than 10 billion light-years.
The universe's expansion, which is the biggest known object in the universe, has been accelerating for 13 billion years.
The best-known measurement of the universe's size is the rate at which the universe is expanding.
